TopicTitle: Things we say in our sleep

Articles.Content:
So, lately I fell asleep and started mumbling. When my friend asked what's wrong, I answered "Cats. It's cats." and then screamed "They're everywhere!!" and fell back asleep. So, what fun stuff have you said in your sleep?

Edited December 18, 2014 by BadRocketsCo.
I binge watched "Spice & Wolf" and woke up sometime later that week calling out the female protagonists name. I don't remember the dream though.
I don't know if i talk in my sleep or not, my head hits the pillow then it's morning.
I lecture about KSP in my sleep
Before I go to sleep, usually mumble about all the cool KSP designs I could never build.

I lecture about KSP in my sleep

hehe

...mumble...delta-v....mumble...ejection burn...mumble mumble......no! Jeb! no!....mumble

as for me, I don't know, I sleep alone...........

I sleep alone.....

I know how it feels...
Couldn't tell yah. I'd have to record myself, and I'm not going to listen to 8 hours of white noise in case I said anything.

I don't speak myself, I just listen to the other people in the dorm talking and want to tell them all to shut up. But that's if I'm at school, if i'm at home I'm out for the count as soon as i'm under my duvet.

Couldn't tell yah. I'd have to record myself, and I'm not going to listen to 8 hours of white noise in case I said anything.

Just load the recording into a sound editor and look for spikes in the waveform.

When I first started at the retread plant years ago I'd have dreams/nightmares about too many tires everywhere. I know I woke my wife with my ravings but don't know any specific things I may have said

Couldn't tell yah. I'd have to record myself, and I'm not going to listen to 8 hours of white noise in case I said anything.

Yeah. Same here...
